sentence.value: Robert Shane Kimbrough (born June 4, 1967) is a United States Army officer and a NASA astronaut.

sentence.value: He was part of the first group of candidates selected for NASA astronaut training following the Space Shuttle Columbia disaster.

sentence.value: Kimbrough graduated from the United States Military Academy in 1989 with a B.S. in aerospace engineering, and served as an Apache helicopter pilot in the first Gulf War, Operation Desert Storm in 1991.

sentence.value: He helped NASA train astronauts on landing procedures for several years before he himself was selected for training.
